languages.text: "Я действую во благо Империума. Зев закрыт, и десятина погибает без пользы — я же использую ее, чтобы создать в Коронусе оплот порядка и закона, а когда проход откроется, возмещу все сторицей".

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."
languages.original_text: "Я действую во благо Империума. Зев закрыт, и десятина погибает без пользы — я же использую ее, чтобы создать в Коронусе оплот порядка и закона, а когда проход откроется, возмещу все сторицей".

traits.locale_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed and the tithe is being wasted, but I will use it to establish a bulwark of order in Koronus, and once the passage is opened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed and the tithe is being wasted, but I will use it to establish a bulwark of order in Koronus, and once the passage is opened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in Koronus, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in Koronus, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

"I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

languages.text: "Ich handle für Wohl des Imperiums. Der Schlund ist geschlossen und der Zehnt wäre verloren. Deshalb benutze ich ihn stattdessen, um ein Bollwerk der Ordnung in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu errichten, und sobald die Passage wieder frei ist, wird der Zehnt hundertfach beglichen."
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: "Ich handle für Wohl des Imperiums. Der Schlund ist geschlossen und der Zehnt wäre verloren. Deshalb benutze ich ihn stattdessen, um ein Bollwerk der Ordnung in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu errichten, und sobald die Passage wieder frei ist, wird der Zehnt hundertfach beglichen."

languages.text: « Je prends cette décision dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium. La dîme ne sert à rien tant que la Gueule est fermée. Au lieu de la laisser se perdre, je vais l'utiliser pour faire régner l'ordre dans les Étendues de Koronus. Ainsi, lorsque le passage se rouvrira, la dîme sera remboursée au centuple. »
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: « Je prends cette décision dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium. La dîme ne sert à rien tant que la Gueule est fermée. Au lieu de la laisser se perdre, je vais l'utiliser pour faire régner l'ordre dans les Étendues de Koronus. Ainsi, lorsque le passage se rouvrira, la dîme sera remboursée au centuple. »

languages.text: “我这么做是为了帝国的利益。巨口已经无法通行，什一税只会白白浪费掉。正因如此，我打算用这些资源在科罗努斯扩区建立起秩序的要塞。一旦巨口重新恢复通行，我会将挪用的资源百倍奉还。”
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: “我这么做是为了帝国的利益。巨口已经无法通行，什一税只会白白浪费掉。正因如此，我打算用这些资源在科罗努斯扩区建立起秩序的要塞。一旦巨口重新恢复通行，我会将挪用的资源百倍奉还。”

languages.text: «Estoy actuando por el bien del Imperium. Las Fauces están cerradas y el diezmo se pudre en su encierro. Por lo tanto, en lugar de permitir que eso ocurra, lo utilizaré para establecer un bastión del orden en la Extensión de Koronus, y, cuando se reabra el pasaje, se devolverá cien veces el valor del diezmo».
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy actuando por el bien del Imperium. Las Fauces están cerradas y el diezmo se pudre en su encierro. Por lo tanto, en lugar de permitir que eso ocurra, lo utilizaré para establecer un bastión del orden en la Extensión de Koronus, y, cuando se reabra el pasaje, se devolverá cien veces el valor del diezmo».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は帝国のために行動している。マウは閉ざされているから、租税は無駄になる。だからこそ、その租税をコロヌス・エクスパンスにおける秩序の砦を築くために使おう。通路が再び開かれた時には、その租税は百倍にして返してやるさ」
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は帝国のために行動している。マウは閉ざされているから、租税は無駄になる。だからこそ、その租税をコロヌス・エクスパンスにおける秩序の砦を築くために使おう。通路が再び開かれた時には、その租税は百倍にして返してやるさ」

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un iyiliğini gözetiyorum. Ağız kapalı, aşar boşa gidecek. Bu yüzden onu Koronus Enginliği'nde nizamı sağlamakta kullanacağım. Geçit yeniden açıldığında aşar, yüz katı olarak geri ödenecek."
languages.original_text: "I am acting for the good of the Imperium. The Maw is closed, and the tithe is going to waste. Therefore, I will instead use it to establish a bulwark of order in the Koronus Expanse, and once the passage is reopened, the tithe will be repaid a hundredfold."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un iyiliğini gözetiyorum. Ağız kapalı, aşar boşa gidecek. Bu yüzden onu Koronus Enginliği'nde nizamı sağlamakta kullanacağım. Geçit yeniden açıldığında aşar, yüz katı olarak geri ödenecek."
